1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Parser for token tree.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.TTree.Parse
6  ( -- * Parser
7    ttrees, ttreeGroup,
8  
9    -- * Abbreviation
10    tt, tt1, ttPrint, ttDoc,
11
12    -- * Split and divide
13    splitTokensBy, splitTreesBy,
14    divideTreesBy,
15    divideTreesByBar, divideTreesByColon, divideTreesByEqual,
16  ) where
17
18import qualified Text.PrettyPrint                        as P
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture                as O
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                    as B
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Token            as S
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.TTree.Bracket    as S
23import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.TTree.TokenTree  as S
24
25
26-- --------------------------------------------  Parser
27
28-- | Parse tokens with brackets into trees.
29--   Blank tokens and comments are excluded.
30ttrees :: [S.Token] -> B.Ab [S.TTree]
31ttrees = B.trees S.getBracketType B.BracketNone . joinText
32
33-- | Wrap trees in group.
34ttreeGroup :: S.TTreesTo S.TTree
35ttreeGroup = B.treeWrap S.BracketGroup
36
37-- | Join fragmented texts.
38joinText :: O.Map [S.Token]
39joinText = join where
40    join ((S.TText cp f1 s1) : (S.TText _ f2 s2) : xs)
41        | isQqKey f1 && isQqKey f2
42            = let x' = S.TText cp S.TextQQ (s1 ++ s2)
43              in join (x' : xs)
44    join ((S.TText cp f1 s1) : xs)
45        | isQqKey f1                = (S.TText cp S.TextQQ s1) : join xs
46    join (x : xs)                   = x : join xs
47    join []                         = []
48
49-- | Test double-quoted or related text.
50isQqKey :: O.Test S.TextForm
51isQqKey f = f == S.TextQQ || f == S.TextKey
52
53
54-- --------------------------------------------  Abbreviation
55
56-- | Convert string to token trees.
57tt :: String -> B.Ab [S.TTree]
58tt s = ttrees $ S.sweepToken $ S.toks s
59
60-- | Parse string and group it.
61tt1 :: String -> B.Ab S.TTree
62tt1 = Right . ttreeGroup B.<=< tt
63
64-- | Parse string and print it.
65ttPrint :: String -> IO ()
66ttPrint s = case tt s of
67              Left msg    -> print msg
68              Right trees -> do print $ ttDoc trees
69                                return ()
70
71-- | Get 'B.Doc' value of token trees for pretty printing.
72ttDoc :: S.TTreesTo B.Doc
73ttDoc = dv where
74    dv = B.pprintV . map d
75    d (B.TreeL x) = B.pprint "TreeL :" B.<+> B.pprint x
76    d (B.TreeB n pp xs) =
77        let treeB = B.pprintH ["TreeB", show n] B.<+> brackets pp
78        in P.hang treeB 2 (dv xs)
79
80    brackets Nothing = B.pprint "no brackets"
81    brackets (Just (open, close)) = B.pprintH [B.pprint ":", B.pprint open, B.pprint close]
82
83
84-- --------------------------------------------  Split and divide
85
86-- | Split token list by unquoted word.
87--   If token list contains the word,
88--   pair of /before-list/, /the-word/ and /after-list/ is returned.
89--   If does not contains the word,
90--   original token list is returned.
91--
92--   >>> let Right t = S.toks "b c"
93--   >>> splitTokensBy (== "|") t
94--   Left [ TText  CodePt {..} TextRaw "b"
95--        , TSpace CodePt {..} 1
96--        , TText  CodePt {..} TextRaw "c" ]
97--
98--   >>> let Right t = S.toks "a | b | c"
99--   >>> splitTokensBy (== "|") t
100--   Right ( [ TText CodePt {..} TextRaw "a", TSpace CodePt {..} 1]
101--         , TText CodePt {..} TextRaw "|"
102--         , [ TText  CodePt {..} TextRaw "b"
103--           , TSpace CodePt {..} 1
104--           , TText  CodePt {..} TextRaw "|"
105--           , TText  CodePt {..} TextRaw "c" ] )
106
107splitTokensBy :: O.Test String -> B.SplitList3e S.Token
108splitTokensBy p = B.splitBy p2 where
109    p2 (S.TTextRaw _ x)  = p x
110    p2 _ = False
111
112raw :: O.Test String -> S.TTree -> Bool
113raw p (S.TextLeafRaw _ w) = p w
114raw _ _ = False
115
116-- | Split token trees by quoteless token of given string.
117splitTreesBy :: O.Test String -> B.SplitList3e S.TTree
118splitTreesBy = B.splitBy . raw
119
120-- | Divide token trees by quoteless token of given string.
121divideTreesBy :: O.Test String -> S.TTreesTo [[S.TTree]]
122divideTreesBy = B.divideBy . raw
123
124-- | Divide token trees by vertical bar @\"|\"@.
125divideTreesByBar :: S.TTreesTo [[S.TTree]]
126divideTreesByBar = divideTreesBy (== "|")
127
128-- | Divide token trees by colon @\":\"@.
129divideTreesByColon :: S.TTreesTo [[S.TTree]]
130divideTreesByColon = divideTreesBy (== ":")
131
132-- | Divide token trees by equal sign @\"=\"@.
133divideTreesByEqual :: S.TTreesTo [[S.TTree]]
134divideTreesByEqual = divideTreesBy (== "=")
135
